customKeycodes.name: NEXTSEN
customKeycodes.title: Add a dot then capitalize the first letter of a new sentence (US layout)

customKeycodes.name: PREDL
customKeycodes.title: Поставить точку и начать новое предложение с заглавной буквы (Русская раскладка)

customKeycodes.name: BRACES
customKeycodes.title: This keycode types [, then ], and taps the left arrow to position the cursor between the []. Or if shift is held, it does the same but with curly braces {}.

customKeycodes.name: PARENTH
customKeycodes.title: This keycode types (, then ), and taps the left arrow to position the cursor between the ().

customKeycodes.name: ALT_TAB
customKeycodes.title: Holds Alt and taps Tab, then waits for 750ms, if the key is tapped again, it will send another Tab; if there is no tap, Alt will turn off. This allows you to cycle through windows with only one key
